changeSet.sql:
create table application_user ( id bigserial primary key, username varchar(255) not null, name varchar(255) not null, password varchar(255) not null, created_at timestamp, created_by varchar(255), updated_at timestamp, updated_by varchar(255) );
create table application_user_role ( id bigserial primary key, application_user_id bigint not null references application_user (id), role varchar(255) not null, created_at timestamp, created_by varchar(255), updated_at timestamp, updated_by varchar(255) );
